Hi

I have this class which is a Utility class (A property Reader)in the 
server side. It will be accessed by Server side components to read 
various property values using JNDI. 

Whass the best approach to write a test case for this class? specially 
taking in to consideration the fact that this class needs to be in a 
particular App Server Container to access the container environment.

Thanks for any ideas 

Please help

Mahen
